title: The House of the Masks
description: The House of the Masks (also known as the House of the Comedians), built around 150-100 BC, was a luxurious residential complex that may have housed traveling troops of actors performing at the theater in Delos.

properties.description: The House of the Masks is visible through satellite imagery to the southeast of the theater at Delos. This has been confirmed through pictures and the archaeological plan.
properties.title: Imagery location for the House of the Masks at Delos
